biocontainers.name: microhapdb
biocontainers.summary: Portable database of microhaplotype marker and allele frequency data.

biotools.summary:
A portable and extensible database of all published microhaplotype marker and frequency data.


MicroHapDB is a portable database intended for scientists and researchers interested in microhaplotypes for forensic analysis.

bioschemas.name: MicroHapDB

A portable and extensible database of all published microhaplotype marker and frequency data.


MicroHapDB is a portable database intended for scientists and researchers interested in microhaplotypes for forensic analysis.
